file.name: api-docs.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: 'Hardware Api'
  contact:
    email: jacek_slawinski@poczta.onet.pl
  license:
    name: 'Apache 2.0'
    url: 'http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html'
  version: 1.0.0
servers:
  - url: 'http://...'
    description: 'Api'
paths:
    /hardware:
      $ref: './hardware/paths.yaml#/hardware'
    /hardware/{id}:
      $ref: './hardware/paths.yaml#/hardwareid'
    /system:
      $ref: './system/paths.yaml#/system'
    /system/{id}:
      $ref: './system/paths.yaml#/systemid'
    /transfer:
      $ref: './transfer/paths.yaml#/transfer'
components:
  parameters:
    JWT_token:
      name: Authorization
      in: header
      description: 'JWT access token'
      required: true
      schema:
        type: string
tags:
  - name: Hardware
    description: About Hardware
  - name: System
    description: About system
